The critters have gathered here, as you can see.
Excellent! We've reached the last part of the story. And so the little ones join hands ... No, they are not "little" anymore.
When it comes to visitors, it treats them all the same.
Come hither, come hither—they beckon warmly, dancing and prancing like playful lambs.
"Stay, stay," they murmur incessantly. Their expressions are kind and their wine is overflowing.

A Critter that mimics human customs.
Every proper gentleman knows that a neatly groomed and precisely trimmed beard signifies refinement and class. And this Carbuncle is certainly no exception.

A group of critters that mimics human customs.
A scholar once argued that the act of these critters criticizing each other's appearance is proof of the superiority of human society.

A critter that perfectly mimics human customs.
Even the most discerning of human gentlemen cannot find fault in its manners, and it has always taken great pride in this.

A vigilant guard of Vienna.
He sees little difference between arcanists and foreign spies, except that it's harder to get a bonus for capturing the former.

A devoted guard of Vienna.
Recent concerns about espionage have rattled his nerves, but also ignited his fervor to serve the Empire.

A young princess, new to society and eager to learn.
Nodding, greeting, Auto Island and the Rose Garden. Everything is so fresh and lovely in this world.

A young princess new to society—a brave lady in the making.
Beyond the rose garden and liquid gold, beyond abundance and beauty—she knows little, yet she forges ahead.

A fervent and angry rebel.
He believes he can find everything he needs in the kingdom of freedom—everything except his boss, bankers, and a life of monotony.

The eternal focus of the ball.
From yesteryear to beyond the horizon of tomorrow, every era needs its Venus.

The hostess of the mysterious exhibit.
It is said that in her exhibition there are no titles, no small talk, and no luxurious furniture—yet her guests are all sumptuous and fragrant.

A sweet, dark seed.
Ladies and gentlemen, trust me when I say that this is the key to a new era of prosperity.

A popular museum exhibit.
Humans have been known to get lost in their fantasies of the unknown, meticulously planning every detail. But hey, stop crowding and staring, you nosy humans!

A stroller on the ring road.
Circular roads are her favorite. The beginning and end points have no meaning, so the views and the wind along the way can potentially go on forever.

A stroller on the ring road.
The next badge to earn in Girl Scouts: Mastering the Art of Relaxation. Fortunately, her companion is a seasoned instructor.

Just an ordinary mirror.
How does the old saying go? Oh, right ... "Seeing is believing."

A passionate collector.
His definition of art is so expansive that his collection continues to grow, along with his frustration with those who dismiss its beauty.

Part of the Artwork Collector's collection.
Colors burst from their cages, baring their claws against a bygone era.

Part of the Artwork Collector's collection.
In the realm of lines and surfaces, the essence remains eternal.

Part of the Artwork Collector's collection.
Both sunlight and shadow speak their own unique language, each with its own meaning and message.

A gardener who loves flowers.
Centuries pass and times change from better to worse—but what does all this have to do with the gardener and the flowers?

A bud nestled in the park, ready to bloom.
Do these blooms belong to the ruler? Do they belong to the elite? No, flowers bloom for their own beauty alone.

Prop armor enchanted by Heinrich.
It has seen glorious battles and thunderous applause, but now, there is no more music. Yet the effects of what it will experience next will be more real than anything before.

A prop wand enchanted by Heinrich.
Every story needs a touch of wonder, and this was created to provide just that.

One of the few who returned from the "Storm."
And thus dreams were shattered, and a curtain of rain rose from the ground, creating a second river that mirrored its counterpart in the sky.

A well-informed source of inspiration.
Art often mirrors real life, it's just a matter of paying closer attention.

A diligent chronicler of stories.
She is a conduit for stories from every corner of the world, each retold with intricate detail and heartfelt passion.

A gentle listener.
People always want to go faster. She patiently listens to all the voices that have fallen behind, one by one.

A collection of voices, left behind by the new era.
New transportation, fashion trends, and lifestyles ... there will always be those who struggle to keep up. Luckily, we have a listener waiting, just for them.

A hardworking café waitress.
The city houses the dreams of young women. They weave through the café, their steps light and deft, noting the dreams they chase on their order pads.

It's a delicious apple pie ... is it not?
A fruit with a long and wonderful history, a symbol of sacred wisdom, carefully prepared according to an ancient recipe. This long tradition should be kept in mind while eating.

A horse that gallops through the bustling city streets.
And as for the winter evenings filled with apples, oats, and sugar cubes, there are countless stories waiting to be told... Neigh!

An eccentric genius inventor.
In this era, people have come to understand the fine line between madness and brilliance.

A reporter in search of news.
Carefully choosing the threads of information, weaving them together with precision, and presenting them to the public through the written word.

A customer relaxing in a café.
After a long day, they sit back and sip a hot cup of coffee while discussing the latest trends in employee benefits. It's a routine that never changes.

A customer dining in a café.
More sugar and cream for our generous client and his friends!

A customer sitting in the corner of a café.
The pure bitterness of black coffee, reminiscent of a string of ones and zeros—continuous and steady.

A battle-hardened knight.
The knight and his sword are versatile tools, useful both on the battlefield and in the kitchen.

A loyal guardian statue.
Never sleeps, never chit-chats, never asks for family leave, never gets sick, and never complains about the length of its service.
This is what the empire needs—silent and unwavering loyalty, never voicing an opinion or asking for privileges.

A spirit summoned through a seance.
Its wishes are simple—to shake hands, hug, say its greetings, and then say goodbye.

A spirit summoned through a seance.
Its story cannot be brought to the stage, for its memory is as blurred as its appearance, and only its most instinctive desires remain.

A theater audience member with the Storm Syndrome.
Art brings freedom, passion, and joy. Today, he understands this like never before, and loves it more than ever.

A respectable female psychiatrist.
You now know that a mirror can be just a mirror, and that a mirror is often much more than a mirror.

An art lover ... but what else?
Every spectator wants to see a more realistic, more astounding spectacle. This is a wish he has fulfilled for himself.

A renowned actress and dutiful daughter of the Dittarsdorf family.
Who am I? Who am I? Can someone please tell me?

The pitiful, chanting spirit of a person overcome with hysteria.
As the curtain rises, she shields her face, not wanting to be seen by the world. Her eyes are fixed, lost in a state of intoxication for the sake of being intoxicated, crying out for the sake of crying out.

The sobbing, singing spirit of a person overcome with hysteria.
Day and night, her performance is a constant, never-ending rhythm. In the shadows, she revels in both beauty and darkness, her voice singing a haunting melody of blood and flowers.

The sad, miserable spirit of a person overcome with hysteria.
As the final curtain approaches, sadness, grief, uncertainty, and disillusionment swirl within her, and she quietly mourns it all.

107#Gate to the Ring Road #Gate to the Ring Road
Collect 15 stars in total in Artificial Somnambulism.

Where, where? Is it here, or there?
In the keyhole, in the door crack, or under the covers?
The new, flowing, golden me,
The scorching, dazzling, tiny me,
In your heart, in your mind, in your bones.
Blow it out, blow him out, blow her out!
The me to be found everywhere—where am I?

Page after page. One book, then another.
Reading again and again, pondering, seeking.
From the lighthouse, toward reality.
The other side of the ending, no longer abandoned.

The beasts in the woods, or the heads under flying arrows;
The hero's song, or the souls under authority,
A thousand and three hundred years ago, or yesterday.
Round and round, three times.
<nobr>Click-clack</nobr>, <nobr>click-clack</nobr>, be it beak or tail feather.
Content doesn't matter, form is meaningless.
For the sake of humor, it's always a good time.

Rise, fall.
Tightly meshed, shining brightly.
Right now, this moment.
No need to calculate the point of landing, no need to seek balance.
Just a moment of laughter.
The Ballad of a Good Life
A peculiar and mysterious magnesium light. Used for Reminiscence in Anecdotes. Resets after the event, requires consumption of Activity to reactivate during the next Anecdote.
A burning heart made of black diamonds, sweat, and the rushing Red River. Can be traded at designated counters.

A receipt issued by UTTU Magazine. Can be exchanged for items at the [UTTU Shop].
Can only be used during the [UTTU Spotlight Edition: Polar Town] event.
<nobr>Long-buried</nobr> minerals used to process Raw Components at the factory.
A common industrial product. Used to rebuild factories.
These critters thrive in the cold, using their innate abilities to invent minor incantations and ring bells in the snow. They can startle each other, causing them to flee in a frenzy.
A critter of the frozen tundra, it burrows deep beneath layers of snow for a peaceful winter's rest.
A creature mutated from an Ijiraq, it clangs and clatters as it moves. Its transformation is caused by mysterious ores, it has lost interest in building snowmen.
A critter that thrives in cold climates. Arooo! Who here is human? Who here is a companion? Those with four legs are humans, those with six legs are companions!
A type of canine creature that lives in frigid regions. Its fur is thicker, its body more robust and warmer. Every Qiqirn dreams to be like this.
A canine creature that inhabits cold waters. They possess the trait of modesty, which they also bring to the land.
With its scaly, reptilian skin and insatiable hunger, this critter is the epitome of consumerism. Its mouth never stops moving, expertly devouring everything in its path.
A mutant of the Kikituk that thrives in the Olgar Strait. It has a larger mouth and sharper teeth, making it more formidable and ravenous than its predecessor.
A state-of-the-art guard turret from Zeno Arms Academy. It ensures safety and maintains strict order, serving as a stabilizer in any situation.
A combatant affiliated with the Zeno Arms Academy. There are many ways to use weapons, the least common of which is firing.
A soldier from the Zeno Arms Academy, sent to the polar regions. They are known for their discipline, endurance, and sturdy military jackets as they trek through biting winds and snow in silence.
A projection of Kikituk by the Ley Simulator. The lines reveal its composition—water, dust, the exhilaration of teeth slicing through fiber, and the gratification of food being consumed.
A pack of young Kikituk. Always chewing, gnawing, and sucking ... their entire existence revolves around their mouths.
The heart of the ley energy manifested as a response to the chaos of the environment. It senses the destruction, suffering, and endless depletion, but can only muster a few broken cracks in return.
The heart of the ley energy manifested as a response to the chaos of the environment. It imposes the harshest punishments on insolent children, until even the icy hoes and shovels yield in awe.
A stunning mermaid who sings with such beauty. With a long lifespan and captivating appearance, she is the epitome of romance and the yearning for tragic love.
A sea creature venturing ashore in search of food. Its stomach rumbles, urging it to seek nourishment on land.
An ominous figure that terrifies sailors. It lurks beneath fishing boats, the surface of the water unable to shield them from its power.
"Efficiency is key for the modern woman. Who has time to boil water and then steep tea? It's so much easier to just microwave everything."
A dancer joining in on the fun, unaware of the specific occasion. All she knows is that her dance should be tailored to the people around her.
An eater with a voracious appetite. The special dish looked incredibly suspicious, but she still ate two in one go.
The volunteer teacher who refuses to work for free. He claims that this will be his final lesson for the children, as he believes that all work should have some form of compensation.
The leader of a particular gang, known for his charisma and willingness to go above and beyond to ensure his subordinates are well fed.
A loyal follower of the gang leader, willing to do whatever it takes to protect and serve their leader to the end.
A leader from a distant land. He arrives with advanced technology and offerings, but his true goal is to forge bonds of friendship.
A follower from across the shore. He brings gifts, but it is camaraderie that he truly cares about.
An artist who has been given too much recognition and placed in a position above their ability.

Gift Pack From the Ley Lines
108#Greetings from the Snow#Greetings From the Snow

The night is long, the snowflakes dry,
The icefield is silent, more ancient than discord;
The heart is built of bricks, steel, and fervent dreams.
Comrade, behold, I shall paint it all—
Everything anew, bright and distinct.

The third, seventeenth, or fiftieth letter.
Titles, formats, and salutations.
Blueprints clear, expectations enticing, sketched seventeen times.
Dark bread and an empty stomach negotiate.
So, where will the next letter be sent?

The armchair is soft, the microphone in place.
Music chimes, the show is about to begin.
Jokes, crossword puzzles, and sugar.
Sprinkled with a dash of drama, consumed with milk.

A name, or hundreds of names.
The bricks and boulders roar, endlessly.
We do not speak of hearts, or flags and tulips.
Comrade, remember: decay and ascent are equally effortless.
A herb witches are particularly fond of. Used in Insight and Resonance rituals for characters. Also usable as a material for crafting advanced materials.

Crafted with indiscernible materials and blended from a secret formula, this incense is often used to nourish the heart. Used in Insight and Resonance rituals for characters. Also usable as a material for crafting advanced materials.
Made with a spirit, to be planted in a body. Used in Insight and Resonance rituals for characters. Also usable as a material for crafting advanced materials.
Another ancient testament to humanity's destructive tendencies. Used in Insight and Resonance rituals for characters.

The Wrong Side of the Bed

A number in the Magic Square, more livelier than its kin.
A steadfast guardian of the trial grounds, an essential part of the cosmos, or merely a mote of dust, its faces are so varied. It is fortunate, that you and your companions can still recognize it.

A number in the Magic Square, more composed than its kin.
A steadfast guardian of the trial grounds, an essential part of the cosmos, or merely a mote of dust, its faces are so varied. It is fortunate, that you and your companions can still recognize it.

A sluggish mud puppet, born of an incantation gone awry.
Can the stagnant puddle of mud reveal some remnant of its former life?

A follower of the Manus Vindictae from the School of Apeiron.
He spent decades trying to turn the proof of dreams into reality, until yesterday.

A follower of the Manus Vindictae from the School of Apeiron.
She wanders through the tomes, absorbing the light of wisdom. Now, at last, she understands that the knowledge she should worship lies elsewhere.

The embodiment of the taboo, from the precept "Do not eat beans."
Here sits the king, foolish and familiar, yet authoritative and unyielding. There is only one way to get past him.

The manifestation of the taboo, from the precept "Do not touch the white rooster."
Here stands the knight, sword in hand. He is strange and silent, but also stubborn and uncompromising. There is only one way to get past him.

Once a corrector, once a face of intimacy and familiarity.
You have made your choices.

An airship crafted by the Manus Vindictae.
Its heavy heart throbs above the clouds, pumping blue blood to its four limbs. It is foolish and vibrant, forever oblivious, forever dutifully loyal.

The truth held by the Guiding One, its fragments, and they are beautiful fragments.
She sees all things, she foresees destiny. She is the source of a multitude of desperate images, she is the calm at the end of a thousand madnesses.

A remnant left behind by the Guiding One.
A ventricle born of chance, trembling in anticipation of the final moment.

A relic bestowed by the Guiding One.
A shell that survived in despair, silently obeying the instinct to seek death.

A grapevine from the garden.
A manuscript from the School of Apeiron states that vines pruned according to a specific math function produce the most abundant fruit.

A grapevine from the garden.
Some islanders prefer sobriety to the gifts of the god of wine. But they still welcome the sweetness of dried fruit, which is a great aid to flashes of inspiration in the brain.

A resident of the fabric warehouse.
It is just as familiar with fabrics, and its scissors are just as sharp. It has heard a lot about geometry and sewing theory—now it wants to try it for itself.

Small creatures from the storage room.
Few creatures are more enthusiastic about books than they are. Of course, they open their mouths wide for grains, dust, or piles of trash, treating all equally.

The visitor from afar.
In fact, she is more familiar with another island, but to complete her task, she will give it her all.

A keeper of archives.
This is a familiar scene: the manager complains of the tedium of work, drowsy from the long day. But you know, his baton has its purpose.

A child in the labyrinth.
He is well-versed in books and incantations, and his courage is no less than a prince's. So, this story can be rewritten, can't it?

A child in the labyrinth.
She is familiar with weapons and riddles, her intelligence surpassing that of a princess. So, this story can be rewritten, can't it?

The emotive inheritor of stories.
Laugh out loud, cry out loud. Dear audience, know that tragedy and comedy can change from one to the other. Don't blink—it all happens in the blink of an eye.

An experienced architect.
His hands are skilled in creation, even if what he builds is a wall to confine himself. In this story, he will turn tragedy into comedy.

A novice architect.
He is curious about the world, whether it be bricks or the sky. In this story, he will turn comedy into tragedy.

Strange birds who dwell in the labyrinth.
They patrol in the dark, attentive to the sound of footsteps and the friction of ropes, longing for the next meal.

A skilled plate maker ... correct?
His knife is sharp, his wrist steady. He carves numbers into wax plates, or elsewhere, both neat and beautiful.

A clever questioner ... correct?
He is adept at weaving riddles. He draws circles and squares with ingenuity, he knows how to organize numbers, and of course, he also knows how to organize other things.

A spring spirit dwelling in the labyrinth.
Just give her a coin, and the kind spirit will generously tell you the way out. That's what the legends say, isn't it?

A strange dog that dwells in the labyrinth.
If you see an unexplained light like a lantern in the corner, or hear intermittent breathing, please stay quiet, immediately don some form of bite protection, and evacuate quickly.

A strange serpent that dwells in the labyrinth.
Some say it is a remnant of Hydra, or a distant relative of the sea monster Scylla. But compared to these glorious lineages, it cares more about explorers who make a wrong turn.

Guards standing solemnly on the temple steps.
Bearing a sacred duty they take great pride in, not stopping for any obstacle—to this day.

A meticulous and strict magistrate.
Ruling is an art form. She has created an abundance of wealth, but she is not satisfied with this. She will create a new era.

The loyal soldiers of the magistrate.
They may look like a fierce bunch, but when the magistrate's orders are issued, these soldiers unite—so well-trained, so reliable, so loyal.

A loyal soldier of the magistrate.
They may look like a fierce bunch, but when the magistrate's orders are issued, these soldiers unite—so well-trained, so reliable, so loyal.

A merchant on his way to the temple.
You are familiar with his face. He is proud and wealthy, he is always confident. He sets out from Athens, wanting to embark on a journey. Look, the story thus begins—you will see him in many fables.

A bodyguard protecting the merchant.
You are familiar with his figure. He is rude and fierce, he considers himself unstoppable. He sets out from Athens, wanting to embark on a journey. Look, the story thus begins—you will see him in many fables.

A device that conveys the words of oracles.
An imaginative scientist hypothesized: combining arcane skills with mechanical devices might be able to replicate the prophesying process of the Oracle of Delphi, thereby creating a prophecy machine for this era.

A device that interprets the words of oracles.
An imaginative scientist hypothesized: combining arcane skills with mechanical devices might be able to replicate the prophesying process of the Oracle of Delphi, thereby creating a prophecy machine for this era.

The critter guards of the temple.
Some biologists have noticed a unique ecology: even without being fed by priests and pilgrims, critters still linger near the ruins, behaving as temple guards.

A new resident of the Rehabilitation Center.
"It's always like this when a new standard is implemented, it's okay ... people will always learn to write reports."

A beginner in the realm of numbers.
After reading these languages for five minutes, she felt dizzier than if she'd endured a stormy flight and a whole bottle of vodka combined.

A wanderer in the realm of numbers.
This language is simple and pure, and so close to the essence of things. The downside is that the inhabitants of the phenomenal world often find it difficult to understand, but that doesn't matter to her.

An administrator responsible for checking the format of official correspondences.
Yes, this position really does exist. That's bureaucracy, my dear.

A young barista new to the job.
This part-time job is different from delivering milk, walking dogs, and mowing lawns, and she loves it! Oh, perhaps a little too much ...

A flicker of flame still young.
Bringing new life, serving as a tool, igniting hope ... it holds many possibilities.

A member of the Scientific Computing Center's emergency team ... correct?
Quick to respond, always professional, and with high-level permissions, they appear on the scene of any accident in record time—hey, is this really your work badge?

A girl both ancient and young.
She brings flames, whether yesterday, today, or tomorrow.

Emblems of the basic elements.
They are cunning and changeable, lethargic and stubborn. Yes, understanding the temperament of the elements is an introductory lesson for alchemists.

A skilled textile artisan.
When weaving a piece of fabric, or a dream, their essence is the same.

An experienced coal miner.
With calloused hands, he caresses the cavities of the earth, the rock walls and chisels speak to him, and he responds in his own way.

Critters ever greedy for smoke.
They are drawn to the smoke produced by burning. Research suggests that the emergence of this subspecies is not unrelated to the Industrial Revolution.

Strange creatures that gather in factories.
As modern production gradually scales upward, these Bunyips seem to have found a new feeding ground. Amidst the roar of the factory, they peek out, hunting for those weary sighs and rumors.

The alarm raiser of this case ... oh no, the alarm-raising dog.
As a smart and good citizen, this little dog knows when to seek help. It appeals for aid with the help of a translation device, hoping for phone buttons adapted to paw pads to be invented soon.

The officer who first arrived at the scene.
The respectable policemen never imagined that the alarm raiser might be a furry friend. Therefore, before handling the case, they spent ten minutes looking for the party involved.

A giant creature that dwells in the computer room.
"It collects everything you could possibly think of, and it doesn't consume electricity. What's not to be satisfied with?"

Notification of "Promise of the Water" Ending
What is broken shall eventually be made whole.

When the bricks crumble,
Amidst the sound of hurried footsteps,
The heartbeat of energy, orderly and rhythmic.
She still gazes,
At the distant fire that illuminates everything.
And within that fire is the ladder to tomorrow.

The moment of decision has come. Farewell, my friend.
I will forever bless tomorrow,
Hold hope in my heart for you,
And pour out all my remaining courage upon my homeland.
That shaded path, those halls, that golden circuit that bears me.

<nobr>Tick-tock</nobr>, time slips into the water;
The clouds collide and descend,
Sweeping through this fleeting moment,
All things in the world suddenly perceived.
Where is she? Where is she going?

Walking through the deepest shadows, under the intense sunlight,
She disappeared. Not behind, nor beneath.
Not in photos, nor in the mirror,
Only you see her, holding her hand.

The Potomac River flows silently.
Father, oh Father.
The grassy field and white crosses have stood for hundreds of days and nights.
I will set off, I will travel far, my wings are not yet strong, my future unknown.

The Coolest Thing in the World!
Jim Bowie and the Bowie Knife
A Taste of the West Coast
Faes don't understand what pranks are, and pranks have no idea where the faes are.
She is responsible for creating thrilling, spoiler-free snippets to entice you in the trailers and keep your attention during the opening scenes.
She carefully considers every word, trying to capture all that she wants to express in her poetry.
She relentlessly pursues her self-made objectives, hoping for a glimpse of a happier future in the 21st century.
She is an optimistic and outgoing person who is also very empathetic. Her lack of romantic intuition is just one of her unique quirks.
A hollow casing, a container for a spirit. Until that heart is filled with love and purpose!
An ordinary number, a routine calculation.
No words, no thoughts, just a piercing cry born into the phenomenal world.
Major disasters do not usually happen by chance.
They rise from the earth, feasting on the pests that dare disturb their slumber.
One of the subordinates of Legers the Dead. After his wife left, the fire within him was unleashed, freeing the arcanist within.
Belonging to Mercuria, this healing box contains incense, candles, and potions—everything you need for maximum effectiveness.

A young pickpocket from the suburban trailer park. With sharp cat-like eyes, nimble hands, and a pair of muddy, tattered canvas shoes, the young Wisen has managed to snatch meal after meal without getting caught.
A follower of the Order of Enlightenment, an elitist who holds arcanists in the highest regard. A youth bathed in self-bestowed glory, captivated by the changing times and driven by new ideologies.
A follower of the Order of Enlightenment, an elderly woman skilled in alchemical potions. She enjoys guiding humble young people and is adept at making insolent brats shut up for good.
A follower of the Order of Enlightenment, a beguiled enthusiast of potions. Once caught in a maelstrom of skepticism, she is now at peace, awaiting the revelations to come.

A follower of the Order of Enlightenment, a dangerous old man obsessed with the arcane. His obsession with forbidden knowledge sustains what's left of his life, and his faith fills his aging body with renewed vitality.
A special breed, secretly domesticated on the black market. They have developed a powerful desire to tear their prey apart in the midst of darkness.

A notorious figure in the mafia world, known for his control over San Francisco. After pulling the trigger for the first time, he felt an overwhelming rush of control and dominance. The feeling was addictive, exhilarating, and impossible to forget.

A manifestation of consciousness. Shrouded in a hazy mist, it takes on an elusive, indistinct form. Its appearance is reminiscent of the totems worshipped by followers, its figure resembling the decaying remnants of the night. Born in the labyrinth of a mysterious god, it seeks absolution in a world plagued by sin and depravity.
A creature drawn to the brilliance of the mirror ball. This is not only a response to light, but also an innate desire to pursue ideals.
A renowned record collector. He has spent his entire life searching for the perfect black vinyl. Finally, he can proudly display his most prized possession.
Items stored in a beautiful antique cabinet. Even something as mundane as a radio can be transformed into a magical tool, making even the most basic of wands seem unremarkable in comparison.
Items stored in a beautiful antique cabinet. It almost seemed to have a personality of its own, standing as a grand centerpiece for the stack of records below it.
The master of ceremonies on stage, an essential presence at any costume event. Unlike a certain pirate radio host, she takes a more reserved approach to her performances.
A loud, boisterous Critter that snuck in without anyone noticing. Its face is adorned with a splash of colors, its attire seems deliberately chosen.
A loud, boisterous Critter that snuck in without anyone noticing. Do not try to ask it questions, or you will be met with a puzzled and confused look.
A loud, boisterous Critter that snuck in without anyone noticing. It's unclear if Critters have the ability to understand music, but that doesn't seem to stop them from having a good time.
A godfather who is trying to keep up with current trends. While it may seem harsh, his preference will always be for classical music alone.
The first sage to bestow blessings. He brings endless wealth, praising the children born during an era of abundance.
The second sage to bestow blessings. He sends a peaceful breeze, praising the child born during an era of tranquility.
The third sage to bestow blessings. He offers grand ideals, praising the children born during an era of chasing their dreams.
The sage who arrived late. He missed the gift-giving, so he decided to seize the moment and took control of the era and the children's evening with a lively dance.
Known as the city's master of black. His canvas of choice is always black, and with splashes of red watercolor, he creates mesmerizing works of art that leave viewers in a state of awe.
The collector of black objects in the city. She has seen all of the city's finest works, and not one has evaded her grasp in adding to her own personal collection.
She lived a life of carefree killing. Now, she's retired from her deadly profession, but that doesn't mean she has given up using her skills for her own benefit.

She is the one tasked with delivering the family's "bills." Does she arrive quietly? Is she always there? Is she unshakable? Yes, all of these descriptions fit her and the thin black envelope she carries, a symbol of the family's financial responsibilities.

A talented overseer of executions. The story always begins with a young boy arriving in the city, staying on Haight Street, then leaving and vowing to make a name for himself. And now, he has succeeded.

A proficient executioner. He is satisfied with his job: reasonable workload, good pay, and it allows him to fully utilize his talents. However, he can't help but question if his position is truly secure.
At first, he dismissed crystal healing as just another fad. But as he held the small, beautiful stone in his hand, a wave of calm washed over him, bringing back memories of a carefree childhood.
A massive creature that lives in symbiosis with herbs. Its tracks serve as a signal for the presence of rare plants nearby, but also warn of potential danger in the area.
An arcane doll used in sacred healing ceremonies. Don't worry, it's just a simple combination of cloth and stuffing ... What? You're telling me it's actually moving?
A special healing doll with a pair of imaginary wings. Used to mend the shattered aspirations of those who dreamed too high, like a modern-day Icarus.
A master of inner peace, he understands the universe through his calloused palms. The stars and specks of matter communicate with him, and he responds in his own unique manner.
An idolized representation that surpasses the limitations of perception and thought. In the ever-changing universe, rebirth is an integral part of its constant renewal and cycle.
A dedicated astronomy enthusiast with a fascination for Mars. The dryness of the planet serves as a constant guide, whether in the pursuit of astronomical knowledge or personal destiny.
A dedicated astronomy enthusiast with a fascination for Saturn. The moistness of the planet serves as a constant guide, whether in the pursuit of astronomical knowledge or personal destiny.

A man who had the misfortune of losing his job because of a careless remark. A few thoughtless statements that he believed were meaningless, resulted in him being transformed from a respected sommelier to a homeless person living under an overpass.

A motorcyclist with a rooster-shaped helmet. As they ride along California's Highway 1, the gentle ocean breeze causes their bright red crest to flutter in the wind, making them stand out on the road.
A henchman who lurks in the shadows, hiding his brass knuckles at his side. His most trusted companions are strong whiskey and the handmade weapons he carries.
A judge is the embodiment of justice. They do not need to forge new swords, for the concept of justice remains consistent throughout time.
The set of silver armor has endured countless trials, but it still stands strong. The accompanying sword is a formidable weapon, capable of mending and honing itself for each new challenge.
The set of gold armor has endured countless trials, but it still stands strong. The accompanying sword is a formidable weapon, capable of mending and honing itself for each new challenge.

A fierce warrior spirit encased in a metallic shell. It roars and rages, then struggles to catch its breath. The countless battles it has endured have sharpened its will, demanding total devotion from those who forged it.

The Bay Area coastline curves gracefully, revealing a golden angle that only seasoned photographers and mathematicians can appreciate. This hidden beauty of the coast is often overlooked by casual observers.
A modern fairy tale that has gained popularity. It makes its appearance exactly at 5:55 AM. Do not get too close, take pictures, or make any wishes around it.
A popular toy sold by street vendors. Its plush form and elegant design perfectly match the beauty of the golden city by the ocean.
Parents of playful children rely on this compact medical kit. A child who manages to win a race with nine sharp turns is bound to have some scrapes and bruises.
A Model I security robot that patrols the shore day and night. It is a reliable machine with no recorded incidents or failures, making it the perfect choice for customs guards.
A Model II security robot that patrols the shore day and night. It is a reliable machine with no recorded incidents or failures, making it the perfect choice for customs guards.
A detection sentry along the coast, working around the clock to deport any unwelcome visitors.
A Model I security robot used in Alcatraz Prison. Once the third red warning light flashes, it switches from "Alert Mode" to "Sedation Mode," escalating the level of response.
A Model II security robot used in Alcatraz Prison. Once the third red warning light flashes, it switches from "Alert Mode" to "Sedation Mode," escalating the level of response.
A mega suppressor used in Alcatraz Prison. When all else fails, it serves as an all-out ultimatum.
An artist promoting the resurgence of rock music. She leaves graffiti of iconic bands on the back doors of numerous clubs, proclaiming the return of the rock era.
A mysterious source of sound that broadcasts through the streets and alleys. The "Voices of the Streets" radio station shares the freshest interpretations of modern graffiti with its listeners.
The computational core of the electronic kingdom. A crucial target for protection during any major earthquake, and a source of worry for countless shareholders.
A conspicuous illegal merchant that lurks the streets and alleys, ready to make deals. You may be pleased at first, but that satisfaction will only last until the transaction is completed.
A wide variety of temporary jobs can be found on this bustling street filled with outsiders. Hourly wage workers are always in abundance here.
A cryptic horror story that belongs to in the darkness of night. The sorrowful melody echoes in the background, haunting the youth who just want to party.

A young woman passionately delivering speeches about social issues in the streets. Her beliefs in the New Age movement have gained her a large following, although many of them only seem to know how to chant slogans without truly understanding their meaning.
A diviner who speaks with the rivers. The waves lap against the shore as she watches, seeing for the first time the convergence of thousands of rivers.
A Critter that forms a symbiotic relationship with herbs, sometimes camouflaging itself in the process.

Complete all Lv. 1 achievements in this update.

Dusk breaks, the night sky looms.
Drink a cup of hot mulled wine, wash away the cold.
Trading time for progress, never stopping.
Until you arrive, whenever that may be.

Share badges, salsa, and <nobr>well-earned</nobr> victories,
Share a handful of coins, continue, continue onward,
But that faint blue, so blue,
Light as a feather, heavy as a stone,
How to share it, how to speak of it, how to mention it?

Noise, lights, all thrown into the campfire;
Friendship, encounters, all folded into the tent.
Walk, walk,
Walk until morning arrives as promised—
The cold spring flows through every night, washing the dawn anew.

Tulips, cheese, and burnt Welsh rarebit.
Aromas, aromas, aromas, mingled with delicious memories.
White shirts, gold pocket watches, one signature dish after another.
Raindrops, raindrops, raindrops, and shimmering dust in the light.

A gold coin, a silver coin.
A greedy heart, a pair of lazy hands.
A murmur, a burst of laughter.
A fool, and a little spirit.
Floor it! To the Golden City Task

The Girl in the Back Seat
Beast of Niuyang · Yin: Hard Difficulty
In the West, Dynamite, In America

A pseudo-fin footed creature of mystery, skilled in manipulating steam and mist.
Unlike its elusive Loch Ness cousin, it prefers playing an R-rated hide and seek with people in the fog.

A Zeno officer on the run, who fled to Tuesday's Motel for some unknown reason.
Once a brave soldier who stared death in the face, he now resembles a pitiful wretch—a mere beast trapped in a cage of fear.

An urban legend that instills in children a fear of what lurks beneath the bed.
The tale of a terrified girl, comforted by her "beloved dog" licking her hand and lulling her back to sleep. Later, she thanked the heavens that she didn't turn on the light that night.

Beware of sweet-scented invitations from this "beautiful lady."
When the bathtub becomes a pool of blood, when fragrant shoulders turn to rotting flesh, when laughter turns to wailing—a moment of beauty comes at an eternal price.

A specter that appears behind you in the motel's bathroom mirror.
A seemingly harmless and beautiful illusion, unlike any terrifying reflection you've ever heard of.

A Cactusy with the heart of a Wild West cowboy.
This desert plant listens to ghost stories in silence, dreaming of being a stubborn cowboy sprouting from the sand.

A mysterious young lady staying long-term at Tuesday's Motel.
Harmless yet ravenous, she hides her claws, desperately seeking her next meal.
The Mother and Child of Fear

The motel's essence disguised in a swaddling, feeding on fear.
Through the ages, it has been a stable, a derelict house, a sinister castle. Now, it plants terror and unease in the hearts of travelers, making you see that pig-faced butcher in your rearview mirror, making you hear a baby's cry outside your door ...

A wandering human.
He simply did what was expected of him, managing the motel and hosting guests. True criminals don't know what guilt is.

A pivotal decision.
This will shape your future, so choose wisely. We won't just give you the answer.

A representative of the wilderness, gradually tainted by civilization.
It already knows of the electric plow and sugar wheel. Nothing can stop its progress.

A pioneer of civilization adapting to life in the wilderness.
Upon recently discovering reason to be dull and ineffective, he began to try new methods.

The girl responsible for firing the starting gun.
She doesn't aim for your heart, but for the wealth waiting at the finish line.

A critter that appears at your feet with a whistle.
It witnesses duels, deaths, migrations, departures, and the arrival of newcomers ... but it understands nothing, only watching.

A critter always watching over travelers in the desert.
It seems to simply watch them come and go, but actually understands everything, and takes quiet walks at night.

A representative of the representatives of the Wilderness gradually tainted by civilization.
It already knows of the electric plow and sugar wheel, and enjoys many privileges.

A child who dreams of growing up.
After hearing there were more opportunities out West, she decided this was the perfect place for her to prove she's an adult.

Children who live for meaningful connections.
Their dream is simply to remain with their friends and family, which makes them appear to be somewhat lacking in ambition.

The farmer's loyal companion.
It guards its master's land, keeping everyone out ... except the bulldozers and bank managers.

Man's best friend.
It guards the farm for its master, allowing none to trespass.

A new neighbor of the route.
This neighbor has a name, proof of residence, and most importantly, is quiet and doesn't disturb others, allowing it to live peacefully for decades.

A gentleman who grasps the times with both hands.
He loves the era he lives in, and won't hesitate to flatten the old one.

The manifestation of a great spirit.
It occasionally appears in this lady's form to receive the prayers of the people.

A woman mourning an era.
Recently, her objects of mourning have multiplied, from cowboys to eras.

A teacher passionate about all kinds of cultures.
She loves to learn about different cultures through food and language. This is why she's eating her way through the country, one roadside diner at a time.

An alcoholic in desperate need of a job.
He needs work to fuel his vices, and so he headed west.

A jobless wanderer trying to get back on his feet.
He even goes as far as lowering his wages, but it only earns him disapproval from his peers.

It could be a revolutionary invention.
If it proves successful, both railways and highways may become obsolete.

A new employee working hard to save money.
The job is well-paid and simple enough—just stand at the other end of the road and watch the speedometer.

The never-absent winter's messenger.
This time, it's here not because of the weather, but rather due to the market economy.

The most dangerous fins at the card table.
Its cheating skills far surpass those of a card shark. You have been warned.

A despicable person, justified by many reasons.
He has the potential for greatness—now he just needs a hero to make him the greatest villain of all time.

The leader of this outlaw gang.
With his seven underlings in tow, he roams the wilderness, maintaining his own brand of order in his own way.

An outlaw, pure and simple.
They roam the wilderness in packs, causing havoc in the countryside. Ironically, the wilderness has become more stable as a result.

A rogue who dreamt of getting rich quick.
Craving wealth, he planned to break into a vault, only to gain notoriety instead.

A cowgirl straight out of a ballad.
She's dashing and debonair, never needing a countdown in a duel, captivating all who lay eyes on her, regardless of gender.

The quintessential villain in every story.
You can predict the ending as soon as he appears, but unraveling the tragic reasons behind his evil deeds is not so easy.

No villain is complete without an evil canine sidekick.
There are not many requirements for a villain's pet—their primary purpose is to emphasize the wickedness of their owner.

A soldier tasked with escorting gold.
His job is to lead the carriage through the bustling market and "accidentally" reveal the gold inside.

A bar employee as passionate as fire.
Ordering plain water at a bar is an insult—just don't do it.

A poet who sings tales of valor.
Her understanding of rhythm is almost preternatural. In fact, she can even see the numbered notes dancing upon the score.

A traveler with no idea which direction he should go.
Now, he finds himself wanting nothing, completely lost in the darkness.

A traveler who just can't find his way.
He urgently needs a sign to tell him where to find shelter.

One of the few remaining listeners of good old-fashioned radio.
Forever dreaming of the big city, she never misses a sliver of information pertaining to the outside world.

A rare source of entertainment out in the country.
Those familiar with rural life know that sudden changes in radio static indicate impending danger.

An automated robot that maintains the highway, Type II of its kind.
This road is long, so an automated robot is perfect for clearing cars that aren't going anywhere.

An automated robot that maintains the highway, Type I of its kind.
This older stretch of road needs robots to remove broken-down robots.

An automated robot that maintains the highway.
This expansive stretch of road relies on numerous automated robots for upkeep.

A free source of heat.
Using this critter to heat towels might help you save on costs, but just keep an eye on the temperature.

A pure and innocent gaze.
The untarnished stare of a child can sometimes induce a sense of unease.

A tourist from Mexico.
She needs somewhere she can conduct her new experiment undisturbed.

A wanderer from the desert.
His heart set on experiencing a new life in the wild, he follows along the river known as the highway.

An athlete in training.
She doesn't need a car—she blazes tracks on the asphalt with her own two feet.

An athlete pushing herself to the limit.
She can now confidently proclaim that wherever she treads, that's where the path is.

A symbol of the modern world.
Not only does she make trains and cars run, she makes people run too.

Silent, lost, trembling.
Design, wait, and smile.
What is it that I saw, you ask?
That could take a while ...
I saw blood and marrow, and milk and honey too,
I fed my baby, and through your eyes, took up home in your heart.

You want to find the lost lamb?
Search until night falls and the stars surround you,
Search until that milky scent lingers, until blood and bones cover the ground.
And when the darkness comes to close your eyes, when you hear that awful sound,
There'll be no lamb, no trace, and no you left to be found.

Sharp-toothed, silver-tongued, eviscerated,
Fairies, ghosts, monsters.
Giving you form, giving you a story, giving you a name,
Friend, a friend, my friend.

Another fragile dream,
Shattered by a wisp of sorrow, a quivering voice.
I search and rearrange, unable to erase, unable to let go.
Beyond this bubble, what should I do? What can I do?

[Things to Note]
1. Subscribe to Roaring Month to activate the calendar and receive Crystal Drops x300 and Picrasma Candy x5.
2. While the calendar is active, you may collect Clear Drops x90 and Picrasma Candy (Limited Time) x1 upon each daily login. However, if you do not log in and collect the reward on a given day, it will not be reimbursed.
3. The collection counter will reset at 05:00 daily. You may collect your rewards between 05:00 of the same day and 05:00 of the following day.
4. The subscription for Roaring Month can be renewed whenever the remaining days in the subscription term fall below 179 days. Each renewal increases the subscription term by 30 days. Roaring Month renewals are not available if the remaining subscription term is 180 days or more.

A New Photo of an Old Friend
On the Margins of Life and Death

The little critter chasing after dust, influenced by the passion of South America.
Carbuncles are known for their adaptability, changing based on their environment and internal nature.

The critter group chasing after dust, filled by the passion of South America.
A communal, festive group of Carbuncles, they live for celebrations, parties, festivals, and endless sunshine and beaches!

Thugs active around the riverbank residential area, living off plunder.
Their true nature isn't necessarily dark—it's just that the city isn't ready for them.

Gatekeepers of the Apostles Brotherhood, also responsible for a variety of chores and busy work.
From driving, to keeping watch, making tea, and training recruits. They are skilled in all "gang" related work, each one hopes to escape the lower ranks and make a name for themselves.

The gunmen of the Apostles Brotherhood, tasked with their unspeakable wet work.
They can appear in every corner of the city in the most ordinary of guises, indifferent to whether it's mud or blood on their hands.

Children who hang around the riverbank residential area, living seemingly carefree lives.
Youth is beautiful, blinding you from certain cruel and helpless realities.

Senior members of the Apostles Brotherhood, now retired from gang work to serve as the organization's strategists.
Though they've burnt-out their candles, they still support the Brotherhood from behind the scenes. Every organization has figures like them.

Enforcers of the Apostles Brotherhood, once stars of a certain fighting competition.
Though they may be retired prize fighters, they have long realized that no fighting technique is as reliable as a good shotgun.

Special operations combat personnel originally from the Zeno Arms Academy.
Crossing deep into enemy lines, fearless and bold, regardless of where the orders come from or where the road leads.

Regular combat personnel originally from the Zeno Arms Academy.
They are the most loyal soldiers in the unit, and as such, their loyalty is most often tested.

Combat personnel equipped with heavy firepower originally from the Zeno Arms Academy.
From fire support to frontline suppression, they wield formidable destructive power. They are the embodiment of intimidation.

Heavily armed combat personnel originally from the Zeno Arms Academy.
"No worries, just stand behind me." The most reassuring presence on the battlefield.

Frontline warfare personnel originally from the Zeno Arms Academy. 
Their role is to man stationary guns, protecting the rear of the frontline and acting as a solid defense for the team.

A Zeno officer known for his ruthless methods, despite that he cares deeply for his soldiers.
Although he lost his left eye in an arcanum accident, he remains a staunch arcanist advocate.

A body shaped by sacrifice, suffering, and flesh, bringing a moment of hope to the sufferer.
The cries of mortals turn to blood rising in their throats; fate has not shown mercy, and the heavens have not seen it.

A storm summoned from a mortal body, born from the rage of the suffering.
Listen to the howling wind—it never stops. It is as fierce as a maddened soul.

A Zeno officer, Admiral Igor's aide and adopted daughter.
Reserved and taciturn, she never hesitates to carry out her orders. Extremely capable, she handles many of the Admiral's most important tasks. In Lopera's eyes, she is a kind and gentle elder sister.

Old Patient Cobb.
The years he's spent lying in the hospital bed are as long as the wrinkles on his skin.
A secret weapon that puts patients peacefully to sleep.

A Manus Vindictae prisoner.
Wearing a mask of kindness, he has long awaited the coming night.

Boon of the Water Ending Notice
Letter from Ms. NewBabel's Critter Rehabilitation Center
Log in for 4 days in total.
Log in for 5 days in total.
Level up any character in the suitcase 30 times.

Everyone holds desires,
within their hearts, within their letters.
Please, grant me true affection beyond words and actions,
with that gentle smile, those rusted dreams.
I would live for this.

Solitary bird, leaving the nest, 
have you ever dreamed
of skies crossed, of forests gathered?
Sunset, oh sunset, what you shine upon
is neither the way home nor a homeland.
Where lies the rainforest to rest?

One day, we will rise to the transcendent kingdom,
escaping, sooner or later, this painful phenomenon.
But until that day, go forth to prove it,
this icy, sweet hypothesis on the cone.

A crimson gift from a friend,
a burden too heavy to accept.
Joy and sorrow be abandoned; yet the ache,
retains in the heart, a soft murmur.

Enemies under the protection of Memory Shell gain Final DMG Taken Reduction +20%.

    Memory Shell decrease in stacks after being attacked. 1-target attacks reduce 2 stacks, while mass attacks reduce 1 stack. Stronger Afflatus interactions, high rank incantations, and ultimates further increase the number of stacks reduced.

    When Memory Shell is reduced to 0 stacks, it is shattered, causing that enemy to enter the [Truth Exposed] status with a penalty of Final DMG Taken Reduction -70%; and whenever that enemy takes Genesis DMG, all Backup or Substitute characters gain Moxie +1.

[Things to Note]
1. Subscribe to Roaring Month to activate the calendar and receive Crystal Drops x300 and Jar of Picrasma Candy x5.
2. While the calendar is active, you may collect Clear Drops x90 and Picrasma Candy (Limited Time) x1 upon each daily login. However, if you do not log in and collect the reward on a given day, it will not be reimbursed.
3. The collection counter will reset at 05:00 daily. You may collect your rewards between 05:00 of the same day and 05:00 of the following day.
4. The subscription for Roaring Month can be renewed whenever the remaining days in the subscription term fall below 179 days. Each renewal increases the subscription term by 30 days. Roaring Month renewals are not available if the remaining subscription term is 180 days or more.

After the time-limited [Ripples on the Water] summoning event ends, <color=#AC5320>this item will expire.</color>
A magnetic medium with a recorded memory. "London Dawning" has been added to the Mood Switch.
A magnetic medium with a recorded memory. "Tourney in the Fog" has been added to the Mood Switch.
A magnetic medium with a recorded memory. "Reveries in the Rain" has been added to the Mood Switch.
Nurtured in the mind, vague, shapeless fragments of ideas with the potential to sprout. Used for character Euphoria or Lucidity.
A thread of clarity floats and sinks in the mind, now rooted, growing, and sprouting. Used for character Euphoria or Lucidity.
A radiant spark flows ceaselessly through the mind, ready to unlock new doorways of potential. Used for character Euphoria or Lucidity.
A casket all arcanists are familiar with. Open it to get a mystical-level material of your choice, used for Insight or Resonance.
A loyal, bottle-shaped friend. Open it to get a 5-star character of your choice. This item will expire on <color=#AC5320>Jan. 9, 2025, at 5:00 (UTC+8).</color>
A handmade memento. Can be traded at special counters.
Proof of defeating puppets. Can be exchanged at the Heart Salvage for rewards. Can retain up to 6000.

A receipt issued by UTTU Magazine. Can be exchanged for items at the [UTTU Shop].
Can only be used during the [UTTU Spotlight Edition: Tourney in the Fog] event.
Plagued by nightmares, she patiently waits for the destined one to awaken her.

A ghost consumed by bitterness.
Once betrayed by her true love, her former kindness is now a distant memory.

An abandoned puppet.
He's searching for a partner, a soulmate, and a beating heart.

He often appears on rainy nights.
The final scream is drowned out by the rain—no one knows where he perfected his deadly techniques.

Wild dogs trailing the butcher in search of food.
They gorge on the meat-filled bowls, oblivious to their shrinking numbers.

A girl lost in the face of truth.
Is she still lost, or has she found her way?

A follower of truth.
With a heavy heart, she has found her way into the embrace of faith.

A follower of truth.
Spurred by his thoughts, he offers everything without reservation.
A child who has wandered into Willow's garden.

A beast-like critter covered in an excessive amount of industrial waste.
Born of modern industry, it adapts to its environment with the resilience of a true Londoner—only it's far better at it than most humans.

A critter lord who sees the smokestacks as the monuments of its achievements.
To this ruler, nothing matters more than choosing the most majestic smokestack. In the ever-growing forest of smokestacks, it has outpaced even industry itself in its grand quest.

A cluster of critters that ingeniously harnesses industrial waste.
They rummage through landfills, assembling odd contraptions, and use their searing bodies as energy sources—marching into a new era, unopposed.

An blazing-hot critter that's nearly impossible to catch.
Clogging chimneys, snuffing out fireplaces, tripping up the lamplighters, it's a menace like no other. If there's a coal stove burning nearby, it slips away from trouble like a wisp of smoke.

A critter often found in the corners of the garden. Inedible.
Born of failure and madness, it's saturated with the venom of unbridled emotion.

A critter that resides in the witch's flowerbed.
Though it doesn't have roots like its neighbors, it loves to bury itself in the earth and befriend the surrounding plants.

A police officer working around the clock because of the Uluru qualifiers.
But when nobody's watching, he takes a moment to catch an earful of the Uluru gossip.

The crowd waiting for the qualifiers to start.
Always buzzing with impatience, they're eager for some new topics and activities to kill the time.

A potion ruined by the wrong timing.
The crucible didn't just end up with a useless goo, it's also got a stubborn streak from the brewing. No matter what people do, it just won't let go of that goo on the bottom.

A failed product from brewing.
Of the few things it can do, leaving the cauldron was probably the best choice. So, it packed up all its stuff and left, not even leaving a gooey stain behind.

An infiltrator lurking in the fog.
A soot-like critter peeking out from the edge of a cardboard box. Is it trying to blend in with all the mask-wearing humans around it?

A hollow tree stump.
It is still in its most natural form, with no strings attached or holes drilled like other instruments. It stands there silently, as if it's still a tree, waiting for the vibrations of Arcane Skill to stir its heart.

Designed and assembled by Mr. Fog himself.
After three iterations, everyone is eager to see what it can really do.

A mutated Cyoeraeth, born from the depths of London's smog.
It wraps itself in a thick haze, thriving in the sulfurous air as it sweeps past the mouths and noses of all beneath it.

Birds often flitting between chimneys,
They nest at chimney flues, their colors lost to the billowing ash.

Amphibious creatures of the Thames.
Since the smog thickened, they just had to open up wide by the riverbank to get a meal.

A surveyor who nails their job even on smoggy days.
The company has a rock-solid talent backup system: if the equipment breaks down, their team members will step in and perform just as flawlessly as the machines.

A surveyor's best partner.
When the job calls for the surveyor to work in the middle of the road, it can serve as a signal like a red light.

A perpetrator who uses the thick smog to cover his tracks.
The ailing economy compelled him, and the poor visibility empowered him.

A vital element for the smooth operation of any sports venue.
It won't be assigned any tasks until the renovation is complete. However, after applying for leave, it was immediately transferred to a different stadium.

A vital element for the smooth operation of any sports venue.
It has to show up for work every day, whether the renovation is complete or not. It deeply envies its coworker—the cleaner off on holiday.

A vital element for the smooth operation of any sports venue.
An overachiever determined to start its work before the renovation is even complete. The gatekeeper had no choice but to let it into the empty venue to patrol.

The on-site supervisor of the stadium construction.
When its request to switch to the Uluru paint was rejected, it lost all its enthusiasm and chose to remain as cold and distant as necessary.

The backbone of the stadium construction.
They're small, swift, and cheap to mass-produce—that's what makes the Uluru paint possible.

The original inhabitants of the stadium.
On a quiet morning, they watched as a group of kind-hearted strangers arrived, determined to help rebuild their home.

The pianist playing on the opening ceremony.
He's always been a solo artist, until he found out he had to share the rehearsal area with other musicians, and that no one was allowed to leave until the performance was over.

A performer warming the bench for the opening ceremony.
This wasn't his plan; but only when he arrived at rehearsal did he realize he had forgotten his instrument at home.

A violinist playing on the opening ceremony.
Full of zeal and boundless energy, he never stops, pouring his heart into every piece he plays on his beloved violin.

A trombonist playing on the opening ceremony.
Driven by her unique vision, she occasionally adds a few high-pitched vocals to the music between her trombone notes.

The piccolo player playing on the opening ceremony.
Formerly an athlete at the games, she now contributes to the field in a different capacity after her retirement.

A woman in charge of beautifying the grounds and facilities of the stadium.
After noticing a correlation between athlete injuries and the condition of the stadium grounds, she decides to work from the medical tent to improve efficiency.

A medical professional providing on-the-spot care for athletes.
With the rules of the games growing increasingly convoluted, the steady stream of patients barely gives him the chance to burn off all his energy.

A fairy dancing in the fertile fields.
Her dance moves, originated from the Beltane Festival, evoke the flickering flames of May.

A quiet observer on the sidelines.
It's not that it doesn't want to cheer—in fact, no one is more disheartened by its own silence than it is.

A loyal spectator on the sidelines.
A regular at the games, always watching intently, even if it doesn't have three faces looking in three directions like its Irish cousin.

A fairy dancing in the lush fields.
She once consumed a magic fruit, and from that moment on, her dance has granted her audience the gift of conditional immortality.

Someone we might run into in the mist.
She drank wave after wave of mist, and in doing so, she gained immortality, according to the most famous tale about her.

Someone we've all met in the mist.
Through the fog, he emerges, surrounded by swirling wisps of cold mist. But just as quickly, he retreats, disappearing back into the fog.

One drawn here by the spirit of global camaraderie.
He seems to particularly enjoy watching the players' pre and post-match interactions, as if those are the only reason he showed up.

An athlete who didn't register for the games.
She stepped onto the field in the dead of night, as if the stars were the only judges and audience she needed.

Often seen roaming places charged with emotion.
They're born from excitement, sweat, and cheers, and in return, they bring vigor, passion, and smiles.

A citizen who's still up when the knocker-upper taps on his window. 
His frustration, of course, isn't just about the money wasted on an unneeded wake-up call.

A citizen who's still wide awake when the knocker-upper taps on his window. 
He counts the gray hairs on his pillow from all those sleepless nights, only to realize that he has been at it all night.

An early-rising potionist.
Her recent research focuses on a potion that helps people wake up early—an invention entirely with the best of intentions, of course.

A potion scholar who always struggles to get out of bed.
After oversleeping three days in a row, she regretfully admitted that her peer's early bird potion still needs some work.

A snail that isn't quite a snail.
Its body is covered in fur, and it's chock-full of energy ... Since it always leaves a trail of slime, it is still considered a snail.

A creature that sees knocker-uppers as its arch-nemeses.
It wanders through dreams, always taking the left path at every fork ... until there is a sudden knock on the window.

A creature that sees knocker-uppers as its arch-nemeses.
It drifts through dreams, always taking the right path at every fork ... until there is a sudden knock on the window.

The source of the constant gnashing of teeth in the smog.
It never fails to catch the sound of peas tapping on city windows. Each morning, the citizens wake up to its crunching and the sound of scattered peas.

A spectator constantly busy with opening barrels and celebrating.
She's the luckiest of them all—having correctly bet on the winning champion five times in a row.

A spectator trying to stay away from the crowd.
When the wishes became overwhelming in the stadium, she had to retreat into the gradually emptying wine cellar, desperately seeking some peace and quiet.

A spectator preoccupied with petitioning the Uluru Committee.
She is determined to make Boarding Assault a new sport in the Games.

A visitor torn by the choices at the bustling Uluru Fair market.
With so many suitable accessories to choose from—some delicate, some elegant—it ended up taking them all.

A visitor who struck up a fervent conversation with every shopkeeper he met.
He's figured out how to enjoy the trip in the dense smog—by staying in well-lit indoor spaces.

A mysterious arcane creature often drawn to light and warmth.
Easy to catch and even easier to coax. To keep it around, just make sure your fireplace is warmer than your neighbor's.

A sharp-eyed visitor at the Uluru Fair.
It spots even the tiniest imperfections in products and catches every awkward attempt vendors make to conceal them.

A gladiator setting out on a new journey.
The smog couldn't snuff out her flames. If anything, it only fueled her determination.

A group of gentlemen, striding proudly together.
They offer tourists a chance to learn local customs, expecting nothing in return.

Not your everyday sightseer.
She studies the flow of the crowd and the positions of the stalls intently, unperturbed even when people almost bump into her.

A traveler zooming by.
Her exhaust fumes left a lasting impression—some tourists even mistook it for one of the local attractions.

A timekeeping bird so round that it looks like it swallowed a clock.
Precise, impartial, and a master of counting, it makes anyone who encounters it realize how much time they've wasted in their lives.

Birds that chirp like the ticking of a clock's second hand.
They're often seen flitting around time wasters, their tick-tocks getting on the nerves of these procrastinators and wearing down their resolve.
She never fears the crashing waves. All the stars have their eyes on you, so don't be shy! Let's rock!
In the Fire, In the Shadow
A Dream That Never Grows Old

A leaf falls from a branch.
Flee, flee further still, says the wind,
Otherwise, you'll turn to sludge.
I wish to fly toward the rapids, I wish to fly toward the gorge,
The leaf replies,
See, over there, even the ants are still fighting.

Polish, lubricate, and fasten.
What once raised her up now leaves her a hollow shell.
Echoes across the floor, through the night, and into the breaking dawn:
Clack, clack, clack.
With each offbeat stride, she turned her visitors away.
The doors of the old house, the doors of the heart, open no longer.

No running about, no questions, no fuss.
Why is it like this? Why not like that? Why does that happen?
The well-behaved child never asks such untimely questions. 
The question mark hangs heavily, but the answer flutters lightly,
Like a paper bird, perched delicately on the hands of a clock,
Fly! Before it falls, catch the answer in your hand.

A pulse of warm light, a mass of writhing shadows.
A flash of coldest hue, a streak of thick, dark red.
Neon lights flicker, lost in the streets,
Endlessly she flows, a river that's impossible to restrain.

An adventurer brimming with spirit.
This was a land of sand and desolation, until she arrived.

A strongly territorial bird-form Critter. 
Despite its aggressive nature, it is welcomed by many engineers. They believe that to be visited by a Tripodero is a testament to the quality of their construction.

A frenzied crab-form Critter.
It conceals itself according to the phases of the moon and tides, remaining all but unknown to even the islanders that dwell nearby.

A migrating crab-form Critter.
Among an already rare species, this unique creature is considered an invaluable and irreplaceable boon for those divining the future.

Islanders from Nukutaeao, now far from home.
Once a peaceful and friendly people, living in seclusion on their islands, they were steadfast in their word and their bonds. But all of that changed with the destruction of their homeland.

Nukutaeao islanders who chose to wear masks.
They have a history worth cherishing and a heritage they long to protect. It's easy to understand their decision—they would give anything to return to a time before their homeland was lost.

A panicked ship passenger.
There are many ways to incite a disturbance in a crowded indoor space, but the simplest and quickest method is to "turn off the lights."

A weapon in the hands of an eavesdropper, apparently a conductor's baton. Conducting is a subtle discipline, and this eavesdropper lurking in the shadows has yet to master the delicate art of "pianissimo."

A ray-form Critter that travels in groups.
Chasing ships is just a trivial episode in this massive horde's grand scheme to conquer the seas.

A young Nukutai.
He bears many burdens: the pain of farewell, the confusion of long journeys, and the struggle for survival ... Ultimately, his mind is consumed by a burning desire for revenge.

A strange figure lurking in the shadows.
Sneaky and elusive, people harbor no goodwill toward eavesdroppers, as the adjectives used to describe them clearly suggest.

Encased in a cocoon formed by the dark sea wind.
This fragile chrysalis is like fine silk intricately woven with patterns of black and blue. The force stirring within the cocoon can shatter the sun like a ship wrecked on a treacherous reef. All things fade, even sunlight; from the dying glow, she emerges, wreathed in the sun's burning halo.

Semmelweis walks to the other side of the window, leaving her old ending behind.
Setting Sail on a Snowy Night

The notes and strings of home play only old tunes.
Young notes struggle to break free from the cradle,
Yearning to be as free as the sea breeze, to roam and wander.
Dearest ones, do not worry, do not grieve,
For tears, too, are a variation of farewell.

From the viscous depths of night, I see you,
My family, my kin,
The radiant dreams reflected in the firelight.
Now I lift you up,
Caressing the texture of words, inhaling the scent of sea salt.
I cannot find, I fear, I cannot find the true you.

My stage, my island.
It's only here that my thoughts leap over the barriers of reality,
Forgetting tedious rules,
Lighting the candle wick, seeing the flicker of life.

Enemies under the protection of Memory Shell gain Final DMG Taken Reduction +20%.

    Memory Shell decrease in stacks after being attacked. 1-target attacks reduce 2 stacks, while mass attacks reduce 1 stack. Stronger Afflatus interactions, high rank incantations, and ultimates further increase the number of stacks reduced.

    When Memory Shell is reduced to 0 stacks, it is shattered, causing that enemy to enter the [Truth Exposed] status with a penalty of Final DMG Taken Reduction -20%; and the enemy takes Genesis DMG.

Testing, testing, one, two, three.
Ahem, now, bringing you an important news update:
At 8 p.m. tonight, a twist ball will be held, featuring unlimited supplies of Dr. Papper, all-night rockabilly music, a special return of the disco ball, and a prodigious investigator along with her ... *signal interrupted*
Finally, allow me and my flower to send you this heartfelt message—
Welcome back, Timekeeper.

Hey, Vertin, while you were away, we uncovered even more secrets! I've kept them with me, I can play them on my screens for you any time if you're interested.
How about we start with a "numerical" girl who saved an ice cream shop? Or maybe an arcanist border collie that can leap over a running train?
*static* Ugh, why is the signal so unstable all of a sudden? Looks like the rest of the secrets are up to you to discover yourself.

5556 ... 5557 ... At this rate, in ten years—no, maybe five—I'll have saved up enough to—oh, it's you! You're back!
Who would have thought I found something far more valuable than the moon above and my savings, inside an utterly ordinary diner nearby?
Please, have a seat. I'll make you a burrito.

Dear Vertin,

The center has recently welcomed some new partners called Munchalos. They are larger than Furry Anglerfish, with unique habits unlike any known critters. I'm confident that if we feature them in the next critter showcase, our brand will once again land on the cover of UTTU.
Time is of the essence—the business plan still requires your input. I'll see you soon, my dear partner.

In the House of Records, I revisited my experiences and glimpsed a new possibility. I seized it—like grasping a rose, thorns and all.
However, I did not push open the painted doors alone, nor did I step onto the golden stage alone, where the curtain never falls.
In the days you were absent, much has changed—including my very being. Also, I have come to understand the arcane principles hidden within the winged key.
But there's no need for regret. It's never too late to embrace change, especially when it's for the better.

Were you performing on another stage while you were away? [Yes, there are many stages in life, even without proper sets, lights, or a script.]
But enough of dwelling on the past, or the future—only today, only this moment. [Somehow, I knew you'd return to lift the curtain and carry this play forward.]

Phew ... you're back! Great timing, I've just finished reading this novel.
As I reached the final page, I realized that the story's conclusion wasn't the end ...
Because, just like the turning of pages, there's always something new waiting to be discovered.

I once witnessed a flood of dust raining down from the bell tower as I wandered through the wilderness. When the rain ceased and I turned around, somehow, I saw your image, seemingly standing right before me.
Oh, Vertin! While you were away, I made so many interesting critter friends! You've gotta join the next twist party—I'll introduce you!
Hey, Vertin, you're back! Do you have any idea how many of this pirate's radio broadcasts you have missed? Well, never mind. Now that you're here, let's fire up the jukebox and get rocking!
I was tending to this mistletoe sapling on the day you left. Later, tiny blossoms emerged—their way of telling me you would soon return.
Hmph, I can't believe Sotheby valued a bunch of suspicious divination crabs over the wonderous orbuculum! Didn't she know I foresaw your return in my crystal ball a week ago?

Oh, I didn't mean to disturb your office—I was just making some "modifications" to it while you were away. Look, I installed an "ice cream jet dispenser" here. Be sure to leave a review after you try it out.
Oh, капитан, you're back. Can't wait to hop back on my Red 38, huh? Well, what are you waiting for?

<color=#AC5320>Exclusive for summoning characters from the [Revelation of the Water] summoning event.</color> If you use this item while your [Revelation of the Water] first summon discount is still available, your discount will remain.
