A tiny tag that captures the scene of the Shehuo parade and stores it in your suitcase.
Used to change Appearances at the Travel Scrapbook.

A coupon for speedy decoration services from the Miracle Mart, allowing you to buy [Miracle Mart]'s [Suitcase Settings] items at half price. This item expires on <color=#AC5320>May 29, 2025, at 5:00.</color> If you already have all Suitcase Settings purchased from the Miracle Mart at the time of expiry, this item will be converted to 990 Crystal Drops.
A package which all arcanists are familiar with. Open it to get a random superior-level material used for Insight or Resonate.
A loyal, bottle-shaped friend. Open it to get a 5-star character of your choice.
Every page contains tickets of bygone journeys. Open to receive 3,200 Old Tickets.

A unique and perfect thread that can spin the Spinning Wheel 10 times in the [Moonbeam Guardian] summoning event.
<color=#AC5320>Exclusive for summoning characters from the [Moonbeam Guardian] summoning event.</color> After the Dushuo Festival-limited [Moonbeam Guardian] summoning event ends, <color=#AC5320>this item will expire.</color>
A magnetic medium with a recorded memory. "Showdown in Chinatown" has been added to the Mood Switch.
An invitation letter. Invites a random 6-star character to join you.
Afternoon gossip from old uncles and aunties in the alleys, secrets even academics could never find. Redeemable at the special counter.
The bright flares of filaments mark the closing of one era and the opening of another, serving as one of the most valuable currencies in arcanum. Redeemable at [Miracle Mart] in the bank.
Can recall the fond memories of past journeys. Redeemable at [Rewards Revisited] in [Miracle Mart].
A nearly flawless bell. Use it to level up a 6-star character to Insight III Lv.1.

The embodiment of a devil's cruelty. 
Whoever touches it will suffer misfortune in the future and lose part of their health and wealth.

The embodiment of the demonic. 
Whoever touches it will suffer misfortune in the future and lose part of their peace and freedom.

A prop wand enchanted by a magician.
Every story needs a touch of wonder, and this was created to provide just that.

Prop armor enchanted by a magician.
It has seen glorious battles and thunderous applause, but now, there is no more music. Yet the effects of what it will experience next will be more real than anything before.
A security robot of the "New Human" Security Company. Its low price has won it popularity amongst civilians.

A traveler claiming to have seen the monster.
She speaks with conviction and eagerly volunteers to serve as a guide—but the path only seems to stretch deeper into nowhere.

An unreliable testimony.
Full of interruptions, inconsistencies, and overblown emotion. Stay patient and keep listening.

An incomprehensible testimony.
Her descriptions are vague, and her expressions baffling. Stay patient and keep listening.

Trust hanging by a thread, ready to snap.
Everyone can sense that something is terribly wrong. Suspicion and accusations are piling up, just waiting for a spark.

A critter that's always chewing, chewing, chewing.
Its appetite and digestion skills have made it an indispensable resident at the Critter Center.

A robber in distress.
When someone's trying to commit a crime, few care about their grievances.

A robber breaking free of control.
He paid a price to escape his chains—nothing hurts more than a grudge that cuts to the bone.

A foundation staff fleeing in haste.
Apparently, the Foundation badge can attract Vigiles ... Who's ever heard of such a thing?!

Staff wearing a Foundation badge.
Shifty eyes and evasive glances—any experienced cop would pick up on this instantly.

A doe-eyed camerahead.
Forgetfulness has many downsides, and being seen as a suspect without being able to defend oneself might be the worst.

A highly professional cinematographer.
Not flinching when fists fly? A trivial task for any cinematographer experienced with martial arts films.

An experienced black market intermediary.
Finding the best arcanum artifacts for buyers and securing the most generous buyers for artifacts—that's his specialty.

A thief caught red-handed.
A plan full of holes and a heart led astray.

An actress long retired from the limelight.
She intends to bring the "justice" she once portrayed into reality—bringing justice to the strong and defending the weak. She means every word.

The chief, reluctant to "dress up."
A festive and brightly colored costume and a crowd of onlookers waiting for a show—this makes even the usually decisive chief hesitate.

A qualified instructor.
Though the process has been far from smooth, she has acknowledged the young Vigile recruit as more than capable—but now comes the final test.

An officer from the Division of Arcane Affairs.
A competent officer must learn to carry out their duties amid festivals and bustling crowds.

A blurry humanoid creature.
Its outline shifts constantly, like an old, distorted recording. Flickering and floating, its very purpose seems to depend on whether or not it is "seen."

A reel of film that has lost its original appearance. Once seen by former friends as evidence of guilt and by wandering souls as bait, it was coveted, sold, and became the cause of disasters. Yet initially, it was merely an unfinished story.
A fleeting snapshot of someone's moment in time.

A resident refusing to leave the lockdown area.
This is her property—she's more eager than anyone to uncover what's going on.

A towering and sturdy shelter.
Humanity built this structure only to discover that it was better suited to Critters.

A lady mentioned by many eyewitnesses.
Beautiful and endearing, she fits seamlessly into tales told on any street corner.

A demon mentioned by many eyewitnesses.
Every feature matches the clues—a perfect creation of collective imagination.

A witch mentioned by many eyewitnesses.
Everyone believes there to be such a figure—clever, cunning, and lurking just at the edge of reality.

Fear stirred up by the arrival of the "Storm," forming the tail of the enormous Bunyip.
Whether wavering or hesitating, neither leads to the best outcome.

Accusations sparked by the arrival of the "Storm," forming the hands of the enormous Bunyip.
Once the form splits into more than one, the attack begins.

Rumors born from the arrival of the "Storm," forming the head of the enormous Bunyip.
Truth quietly shifts as it passes from ear to ear.

The discussions sparked by the arrival of the "Storm," a means for the massive Bunyip to protect itself.
Using this small trick allows it to safely hide out of sight.

Dushuo's Greetings - Revelation of the Water

A black plastic shell, smooth like temple bricks. 
Ten digits stand in line, fingertips leap into tiny squares. 
The child who once played hopscotch has grown up, now steps on the keypad. 
Beep-boop, beep-boop—the heartbeat and the signal chime together. 
Please pick up, old friend, new friend. 
I will tell you of this spring, as it was when we were ten years old.

Props, actors, lighting—placed. 
Rehearsal, editing, effects—perfected. 
Wooden joints click, enacting joy and sorrow.
Higher, better than life itself. 
Like the dreams we should have had. 
Then she said: Cut—

The night is never quiet—it's the perfect time to begin. 
Pack some chocolate balls and foil, crank the dial to the max. 
Red and blue flickers dance in harmony with white petals. 
Hello, hello, my dear friend.
